creator: KP Industries
descriptionHtml:
You can easily add a bunch of images and bind them as PDF.

You can also download and share the generated PDF within clicks.

You can share PDF to multiple platforms

You can add up to 40 images in one PDF.

We make reordering as simple as drag & drop "reorder icon" ( make sure you enable reorder by clicking on three dots on homepage )

You also get advanced editing options after capturing any image ( make sure you enable editing by clicking on three dots on homepage )
descriptionShort: Images to PDF | Made in India | Free Image to PDF Converter | Share and Download
title: Images to PDF (Made in India) | Free PDF Generator

creator: KP Industries
descriptionHtml:
Images to PDF (Made in India) | PDF Generator
We make image to pdf conversion or you can say scanning documents easy for you.

Usage
Our app is used to get images (from camera or from gallery) and then edit your images with our editing options (including auto enhanced, crop, adjustment, filters, markup, etc.) and then reorder images according your needs, then enter filename, password (if wanted), custom watermark (if want), compression (if wanted), now use our image to pdf converter and congrats you have the pdf you wanted.

That’s how we make images to pdf converter or you can say pdf generator, Document Scanner easy for you

We also have brand new folder-system in which you can manage/store your pdfs generated by our images to pdf converter or you can say document scanner, pdf generator.

Why to choose us?
• MADE IN INDIA
• User Experience :We offers you a clean experience excluding
ads.
• Easy :Easy to use and recommended by many users.
• Absolutely Free: Our application completely free.
• Folder System : Folder-system to store/manage your pdfs.
• Editing options :Many image editing options including auto
enhanced, crop, adjustment, filters, markup, etc.
• Reordering Images :Reordering you images according to your
needs.
• we make images to pdf converter or you can say pdf generator easy for
you

Key Features
• Editing Options: We offers you great editing options including
auto enhanced, crop, adjustment, filters, markup, etc.
• PDF History as Folder Structure: We offers you a fantastic way
to manage/store your pdfs in Folder-System
• Reordering Images: You can easily reorder your images by just
dragging and dropping.
• Share/Preview Individual Image : By clicking on any image you
get the preview of that images on Full screen and you can zoom your
image to see and share your image also and you even get details of
image such as height, width, size etc.
• Folder Structure: You get option to create, rename, delete
folders and create, share, delete, move (across folders),
rename pdfs
• image to pdf converter: you can easily convert image to pdf and
use our app as pdf generator or you can say image to pdf converter
• Doc Scanner: you can easily scan documents with our app and
use as doc scanner
• A+ Document Scanner Our App is rated A+ by users based
upon multiple ratings and reviews. You get best quality with
flexibility in our Images to PDF Converter (PDF Generator),
Document Scanner app.
descriptionShort: Convert image to pdf and manage pdf history through our app with Folder System

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
• PDF history with Folder System
- Manage your pdf history with our brand-new folder structure.
- Easily Create Folder, Rename/Delete any existing Folder.
- PDF Listing with details like Size, number of pages and date.
- Rename, Delete, Move, Share generated pdf
- Sort pdf list in ascending/descending order by name, size, date
• Password Protection - Protect your pdfs with password.
• Compression - You can compress your pdfs.
• Watermark - You can give custom watermarks
